page.title: 05THE REPORTER(CONT)
page.content: News is collected by journalists who work for the Reporter,and by free-lance reporters,(they pay free_lance so much per line). {The paper relies on advertising for {a large part of its income. News is chosen by the sub-editor,he decides which of two good stories will make the head lines.Normally this will be the story which affects the people most of all. Recently they have interviewed{Jerry {Marsden(BRADFORD A.F.C.FIRE). Changes in the prices of raw materials would not alter the price of the paper. Sometimes when they have too little material they enlarge the size of the printing.The employees work from 9am to 5pm and two night shifts a week.The Reporter relies on a good working relationship with the police.
